solution.text:
As DG is parallel to BF \(\Rightarrow \frac {AD}{DB}=\frac {AG}{GF}=\frac {_{j}_}{_{k}_}\)
Similarly GE is parallel to FC \(\Rightarrow \frac {AE}{EC}=\frac {AG}{GF}=\frac {_{j}_}{_{k}_}\)
using the above two equations we get \(\frac {AD}{DB}= \frac {AE}{EC}=\frac {_{j}_}{_{k}_}\)
by adding 1 on both sides we get, \(\frac {AE}{EC}+1=\frac {_{j}_}{_{k}_}+1\)
\(\Rightarrow \frac {EC+AE}{EC}=\frac {_{{k+j}}_}{_{k}_}=\frac {AC}{EC}\)

content.text:
In the given figure, find the ratio \(\frac {AC}{EC}\).
given that \(\frac {AG}{GF}=\frac {_{j}_}{_{k}_}\) and DG is parallel to BF and GE is parallel to FC.
